Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The WF3 Types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 Types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 管理工作流程內 執行的活動。

span.span: An activity that manages the execution of an within a workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 活動不會出現在工作流程設計工具工具箱除非工作流程的專案具有其`Target Framework`設定設為`.Net Framework 4`。The activity will not appear in the workflow designer toolbox unless the workflow's project has its `Target Framework` setting set to `.Net Framework 4`. > [!WARNING] > 由於 活動可支援的介面型別有限，所以無法直接使用 與 ，但可使用以 [工作流程通訊活動] 工具 (WCA.exe) 所建立的衍生活動。Due to limitations in the interface types that the activity can support, and cannot be used directly, but derivative activities created using the Workflow Communication Activity tool (WCA.exe) can be used. 請參閱[Windows Workflow Foundation 工具](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178889)如需詳細資訊。See [Windows Workflow Foundation Tools](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178889) for details.
